Html:
I created some controls that I'm actually quite happy with inside the new TaskEditor project.

  • TimeSpanPicker - Allow for complete roundtrip textual selection and direct input for TimeSpan values. All driven by a TimeSpan extension supporting Parse and ToString with formatting.
  • DropDownCheckList - Allows for the selection of enumerated and integer values from a drop down and will update the text accordingly.
  • ObjectPicker - A dialog that internally calls the DsObjectPicker COM object to display the selection dialog for users and groups.

I tried to keep the files simple so others could more easily reuse the controls. Enjoy!
